recipesJson.name: Skinny stems
recipesJson.author: reuben
recipesJson.description:
For all you Absinthe lovers out there.... I like it on the sweet/cool side so please feel free to adjust to your liking. I hope you like it give it a try let me know what you think.
UPDATE: 8-12-20 originally I tested this mix out on a few of my RTA/RDA and it's good but when I used it in a sub ohm tank I found it worked better when I bumped up the Absinthe to 5-6%
